welcome_message:
👋 Welcome to Textify!

🎤 Just send a voice message — I’ll transcribe it for you.
📌 In groups, use the /textify command to transcribe replies.

❓ Need assistance? Use /support.
support_message: 🔧 Support If you have any questions, run into issues, or want to share suggestions — we’re here to help! 📨 Contact us: Support Form 🛠 Support hours: Mon–Fri, 10:00–19:00 (UTC+3) Thank you for using our bot! 💙
textify_error: ❌ The /textify command must be a response to a voice message or video note.
weekly_limit_reached: ❌ You’ve reached the weekly limit of {WEEKLY_LIMIT} voice or video messages. 🚀 To unlock unlimited access to the bot, upgrade to Premium using the /premium command.
